mapper.select: SELECT pod.pur_ord_code, pod.pur_ord_dtl_code, getitemName(pod.item_code) item_code, pod.quantity, pod.status, pod.reccv_date, po.exp_dlv_date, getEmpName(po.emp_id) emp_id, getvdrName(po.vdr_code) vdr_code, p.quantity pquantity, pod.quantity - nvl(p.quantity, 0) notStock FROM purchaseOrderDetail pod join purchaseOrder po on(pod.pur_ord_code=po.pur_ord_code) left join purchase p on(pod.pur_ord_dtl_code = p.pur_ord_dtl_code) WHERE pod.com_id = 'com-101'
SELECT w.name||' '|| nvl(l.name, ' ') name, l.loc_code locCode FROM warehouse w join warehouseLocation l on(w.wh_code = l.wh_code)
